content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
let me tell you a secret - I don't need a pillow when I sleep.
My head is bouncy enough on its own!
info: 闲聊-高好感闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Though there are no crowds of tourists here,
there's a different kind of joy—
one that's cradled tight in the arms of daily life!
info: 闲聊-高好感闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
And after Mobai splashed me awake with tea,
I feel like I've now mastered
the ability to wake up anytime!
info: 闲聊-高好感闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
So, every day I laugh really loudly and take big, deep breaths of fresh air!
Otherwise, my brain might get a little "oxygen-deprived" when I sleep!
info: 闲聊-高好感闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
This isn't something playground toys can give you,
More precious than the price of admission,
Are the friends who play alongside you.
info: 闲聊-高好感闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Shh, I just woke up.
After Glenn dumped me out of a box,
and Sani dragged me out from under a car,
info: 闲聊-高好感闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Life here is so delightful...
Playing together, going on adventures together,
Building our dream world together, making decisions together...
info: 闲聊-高好感闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊
